Text: Re Kelloggs Cc Thanks for sending us the requested docs Paul I have started to prepare the mirror English Law docs Just a few questions Schedule Elligible Currency I presume that in addition to USD we will have sterling And Euros Is an Enron Corp guaranty to be provided CSA Notification timeResolution time in the US docs are am and pm New York time respectively I suggest that mid afternoon London time should be adopted for the convenience of both parties Many thanks Michael

Kelloggs Cc The Kelloggs ISDA documents are ready to be sent out Could you please let me have the counterparty contact details name fax no tel and email details FYI I attach the various docs Please let me know if you have any further comments Thanks Michael
